channel.title: NPC Following Bug
channel.description:
I'm making a few bosses and made them follow you when you move, but I ran into a problem.
When 2 or more people are in the same area, it screws up and walks away like 20 feet from everyone. I used FollowPlayerCB(i, p.playerId); for it to follow.
Base is allstar.
